name: damn daniel simulator (anxiousAwoo)
description:
daniel has lost his vans!!!! can you help him get them back?

this is baby's first construct 2 game i made in like 6 hours

awesome soundtrack by jack

daniel lara by daniel lara

guy who sayz "damn daniel"  by joshua holz

(yes the trucks are designed to piss you off) (yes they piss me off too) (no i will not modify them)
